decision_conditions: The materials and finishes of the external walls and roof of the development hereby permitted shall match in colour and texture those of the existing building, or such other materials as shall have been approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and shall thereafter be retained as such.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012).
description: Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 16/13066/HOU (Erection of single storey side and rear extension and upgrading of original dwelling). Changes and alterations to roof materials, fenestration, drawing the proposed extension 1.3m forward and amending the fenceline to front of property

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Park Road Conservation Area

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
